title: PORNODRONE (ebooks and orientation material)
description:
Title: Pornodrone
Author: Victor Malone
Publisher: Devil's Wax



"And the whisper: hentai heentai heentaaaii crawls through the house, as lingerie draped skeletons unfurl from the walls and reach for my soul with indifferent hands of bone."



Our narrator is concerned: concerned about spending too much time alone. Concerned about all the drugs and pornography heâ€™s consuming, and the hallucinations his television has started kicking out. Concerned about his neighbour John and the strange bags he buries in his garden. Concerned by his lovable rogue of a best friendâ€™s amphetamine habit and endless number of invisible friends. Concerned by the strange disappearance of his work colleague, and most of all heâ€™s concerned by the strange and mysterious porn shop at the centre of it all...

Welcome to the drone!


"Malone is a secret, a very well kept secret, and I hope it stays that way!" - Stephen King
"When people question my psychology, I point them towards Victor, and tell them to go bother that crazy son-of-a-bitch!" - Jack Ketchum
